menu.name: Warp Core Breach
menu.description: A potent, glowing blue concoction simulating the energy of a starship core.

menu.name: Vulcan Mind Meld
menu.description: A serene green elixir infused with calming herbs, promoting inner peace.

menu.name: Romulan Ale
menu.description: The infamous forbidden blue spirit, known for its intense potency.

menu.name: Klingon Bloodwine
menu.description: A deep red, robust wine favored by warriors, with a fiery kick.

menu.name: Holodeck Hologram
menu.description: A multi-layered, color-shifting drink offering a new flavor with each sip.

menu.name: Nebula Nectar
menu.description: A swirling purple beverage that captures the essence of a cosmic nebula.

menu.name: Ferengi Gold Press
menu.description: A shimmering golden cocktail, sweet and smooth, perfect for profit-minded traders.

menu.name: Andorian Frost
menu.description: An icy blue drink served at sub-zero temperatures, refreshing and brisk.

menu.name: Trill Symbiosis
menu.description: A harmonious blend of flavors representing the unity of host and symbiont.

menu.name: Borg Assimilation
menu.description: A black and green layered shot that delivers a powerful punch. Resistance is futile.

menu.name: Q Continuum
menu.description: An unpredictable cocktail that changes flavor and color, defying the laws of mixology.

menu.name: Temporal Distortion
menu.description: A vibrant orange drink that seems to ripple through time with a zesty kick.

menu.name: Starfleet Martini
menu.description: A classic martini with a futuristic twist, garnished with a glowing olive.

menu.name: Betazoid Bliss
menu.description: A delicate pink cocktail with telepathic hints of rose and lavender.

menu.name: Mirror Universe
menu.description: A dark, mysterious drink with rich chocolate and coffee undertones.

menu.name: Synthehol Lager
menu.description: A light beer with a clean finish, replicator-approved.

menu.name: Klingon Ale
menu.description: A dark, bold beer for the bravest warriors.

menu.name: Andorian Pale Ale
menu.description: A crisp and frosty ale brewed in Andorian tradition.

menu.name: Romulan Stout
menu.description: A rich and creamy stout brewed in secret.

menu.name: Bajoran Wheat Beer
menu.description: A refreshing wheat beer from the lush fields of Bajor.

menu.name: Vulcan Red
menu.description: A logical choice, this red wine balances bold and earthy tones.

menu.name: Betazed Rose
menu.description: A sweet and fragrant wine from the empathic Betazoids.

menu.name: Cardassian Noir
menu.description: A dark, mysterious wine from the Cardassian Union.

menu.name: Risan White
menu.description: A refreshing white wine perfect for tropical vacations.

menu.name: Terran Chardonnay
menu.description: A classic chardonnay with a twist from the mirror universe.

menu.name: Vulcan Firewater

menu.name: Klingon Gagh Vodka
menu.description: A vodka with a uniquely bold and earthy aftertaste.

menu.name: Andorian Ice Whisky

menu.name: Romulan Flame
menu.description: A spirit that burns as bright as Romulan ambition.

menu.name: Ferengi Profit Brandy
menu.description: A sweet brandy that's pure profit.

menu.name: Plomeek Soup
